Scripts.OnLoad:
if not _G.TellMeWhen then local AceLocale = LibStub("AceLocale-3.0", true) local msg if AceLocale then local L = AceLocale:GetLocale("TellMeWhen", true) msg = L["ERROR_NOTLOADED_ERROR"] else msg = "TellMeWhen has failed to load! Are you missing a required library?" end
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff33ff99TellMeWhen|r: " .. msg)
return end
self.name = "TellMeWhen" InterfaceOptions_AddCategory(self)
self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_NOTINITIALIZED_INTERFACEPANEL_EXPLANATION"])
self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_ENABLED") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_DISABLED")
Scripts.OnEvent:
if event == "PLAYER_REGEN_ENABLED" then self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_NOTINITIALIZED_INTERFACEPANEL_EXPLANATION"])
if self:IsShown() then self:Hide() self:Show() end elseif event == "PLAYER_REGEN_DISABLED" and not TMW.ALLOW_LOCKDOWN_CONFIG then self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_NOOPTIONSLOAD_INCOMBAT"]) end
